sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Populating Tracker form with values in Catalog Variables.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛First name, 

We are in receipt of your order. Your requested vehicle, 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Vehicle Model, will be delivered to your location at 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Location on 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛requested_date.

Our team will be at your location on 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛expected_return_dateto pick up the vehicle. 

Should you have any issues, our team member, 2 - Create Record➛...➛Name, will be available. They can be reached at 2 - Create Record➛...➛Email. 

We hope you enjoy your rental and thank you for choosing Loaner Vehicle Services!

Loaner Vehicle Services
Your requested vehicle, {{e838c0f3-aa2b-4122-9c43-bd6159e69336.select_vehicle.number}}, has been approved!

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Ask approval from LVA Approvals to approve order. (quick quality check on vehicle before lending it out)
update tracker to Out on Field
establishing values of catalog variables in other records. Decide what gets copied over.

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛First name, 

We regret to inform you that your request for vehicle, 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Vehicle Model, was denied due to a billing discrepancy. Please contact our Billings department to correct your billing information.

We apologize for the inconvenience!

Loaner Vehicle Service

establishing values of catalog variables in other records. Decide what gets copied over.

variable.display_value: Template Catalog Items and Variable Sets

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Populating Tracker form with values in Catalog Variables.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛First name, 

We are in receipt of your order. Your requested vehicle, 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Vehicle Model, will be delivered to your location at 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Location on 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛requested_date.

Our team will be at your location on 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛expected_return_dateto pick up the vehicle. 

Should you have any issues, our team member, 2 - Create Record➛...➛Name, will be available. They can be reached at 2 - Create Record➛...➛Email. 

We hope you enjoy your rental and thank you for choosing Loaner Vehicle Services!

Loaner Vehicle Services
Your requested vehicle, {{e838c0f3-aa2b-4122-9c43-bd6159e69336.select_vehicle.number}}, has been approved!

Hello 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛First name, 

We regret to inform you that your request for vehicle, 1 - Get Catalog Variables➛...➛Vehicle Model, was denied due to a billing discrepancy. Please contact our Billings department to correct your billing information.

We apologize for the inconvenience!

Loaner Vehicle Service

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Ask approval from LVA Approvals to approve order. (quick quality check on vehicle before lending it out)
